body.p: This topic references content from the HTML document that is referenced within the DITA map.

section.title: Inserting Cross References
section.p: Cross reference links to the HTML documents or to content inside of them can be inserted by invoking the Link Cross Reference... action from the contextual menu.
Example: This is a cross reference to a heading inside the HTML document: First Section.
Example: This is a cross reference to a table inside the HTML document: Second Section/table.

section.title: Inserting Content References
section.p: For referencing resused content from HTML documents, you can invoke the Reuse Reuse Content... action from the contextual menu.
